title: Science Class Innovation Design Through Teacher-AI Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of AI concepts and experience in teaching elementary science curricula
context.additional_context: A process exploring how practicing elementary school teachers integrate AI tools into actual science lesson design. Focus group interviews analyze collaboration types and obstacles, with PBL-based development of actionable solutions

learning_goals: Teachers can implement six AI collaboration types (observational, assistive, station co-teaching, etc.) applicable to science lesson design.
Learners can design at least three types of AI-generated customized assessment materials (including formative assessment criteria) for science subjects.
Teachers can create AI collaboration lesson operation plans considering ethical guidelines and curriculum integration strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
